attributes.action: New Business Strategies Needed to boost our economy !!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need government support to consider more innovative ideas from all the business communities in Britian so we can recover from this recession and we should also strongly look into foreign Investments into UK,which will also create more jobs,pay taxes and contribute to the economy significantly,this is the time of unity neither to ask the PM to step down as we all are affected and we have to work together as a disciplined communinity if we were to come out of this financial turbulence,therefore Government & PM approach should lenient towards foreign Investors and it will lead to good gains for UK !!!
